attributes.action: Alcohol should not be for sale in gov workplaces, MPs should not get cheap booze
attributes.additional_details:
This is a scandal, MPs that we have elected, getting drunk on our money and getting into situations that could end up costing even more in legal bills! Politicians should be setting an example to all, getting drunk at work is not that!

https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/4836044/labour-mp-says-he-and-his-colleagues-should-be-banned-from-a-commons-bar-to-help-end-abuse-amid-westminster-sleaze-scandal/

http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/2016/01/01/westminster-mps-alcohol-drinking-problems_n_8902832.html
attributes.background: MPs have subsidised rates for alcohol in Westminster,this has led to a culture of drinking.Drinking at work is not something that should be encouraged, especially by those running the country,we should not be paying for their alcohol and they should not be drinking in work time
